description: Alarm by Digito that reports when volume failed to mount to EC2 instance
prerequisites:
Make sure Amazon EFS utils are installed(see the [docs](https://github.com/aws/efs-utils#installation))
 Make sure cloudwatch logs are enabled in efs-utils (see the [docs](hhttps://github.com/aws/efs-utils#step-2-enable-cloudwatch-log-feature-in-efs-utils-config-file-etcamazonefsefs-utilsconf))
Make sure that you've configured log_group_name in `/etc/amazon/efs/efs-utils.conf`: `log_group_name = /aws/efs/utils`
 Due to limitations of efs_utils and cloudwatch metricFilter this metric can only detect whether some unknown EFS FS failed to mount in a region.
